original: *** Farmhouse Escape! ***
*** Created by Jack Bauer ***
zh_trans: *** 地图由 Jack Bauer 制作 ***

original: *** For any information contact me on steam Steam Community ID --> JackBauer123 ***
zh_trans: *** 如果你有任何想法，请通过Steam联系我。我的Steam社区ID --> JackBauer123 ***

original: *** YOU ARE PLAYING ON EASY DIFFICULTY!! NOOBS!! ***
zh_trans: *** 你们正在玩简单难度!! 菜鸟们!! ***

original: *** You Must Wait For Your Team ***
*** The Train Will Leave in 5 seconds ***
*** To use the barricade hammer, hold E key to move wood up or down, and HIT ATTACK KEY on hammer to place a wood barricade! ***
zh_trans: *** 要使用障碍锤子，按住 E 键将木板上下移动，然后切换到锤子，点击攻击键把木板放下! ***

original: *** Level B Door Opens in 25 Seconds ***
*** Level B Door Opens in 15 Seconds ***
*** Zombies Has Reached The Checkpoint ***
*** Level B Door Opens in 5 Seconds ***
*** THE MOVING CHECKPOINT WILL GO TO THE SPACE AREA IN 15 SECONDS!! ***
zh_trans: *** 僵尸将在 15 秒后传送至太空区域!! ***

original: *** WAIT WHILE THE PORTAL IS BEING OPENED!!!! ***
*** THE PORTAL IS OPEN!!! GO!!!! ***
*** THAT BIG X ON THE RIGHT IS A SECRET PATH THAT ONLY THE ICE GUN HOLDER CAN GO! ***
zh_trans: *** 右边的大 X 是持有冰冻枪的人才能走的密道! ***

original: *** Exit Door Opens in 15 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 出口大门 15 秒后开启 ***

original: *** THIS ELEVATOR IS HAUNTED, YOU MAY BE LUCKY IF YOU SURVIVE!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 这电梯有些不干净的东西，活不活得下来看你命咯~ ***

original: *** Exit Door Opens in 5 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 出口大门 5 秒后开启 ***

original: *** The Lake Water Got Contaminated ***
*** BREAK THE BLUE BARREL TO PLAY AS THE TANK!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 破坏蓝色木桶以扮演坦克!!! ***

original: *** TANK INSTRUCTION : PRESS E TO USE SMASH ATTACK ***
zh_trans: *** 坦克使用说明 : 按 E 使用猛烈攻击 ***

original: *** LEFT-MOUSE BUTTON TO PUNCH HUMAN ***
*** RIGHT-MOUSE BUTTON TO THROW A ROCK ***
*** THE TANK WILL AUTO DIE IN 60 SECONDS IF ITS NOT KILLED BY THE HUMANS!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 如果人类没杀死坦克，那么会坦克 60 秒后原地去世!!! ***

original: *** Eletric Fence Disabled ***
*** The Helicopter is coming ***
*** Rescue ETA in 1 minute ***
*** Press E to freeze the water with this gun!! ***
zh_trans: *** 按 E 用冰冻枪冻结水面!! ***

original: *** HOLD E to charge this plasma gun. When FULLY charged, HIT ATTACK KEY ON PLASMA GUN TO SHOOT!! ***
zh_trans: *** 按住 E 给离子枪充能，当能量充满时，按左键发射!! ***

original: *** THIS ITEM IS VERY DANGEROUS SO CAREFUL WHEN USE IT. ***
zh_trans: *** 这个神器能把队友给杀死，所以谨慎使用. ***

original: *** BREAK THE BRIDGE LADDER TO HOLD THE ZOMBIES!!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 破坏桥上的梯子，守住僵尸!!!! ***

original: *** Detonation in 3 Seconds ***
*** CASTLE DOOR IS CLOSING IN 5 SECONDS ***
zh_trans: *** 堡垒大门 5 秒后关闭 ***

original: *** The Helicopter Will Depart in 30 seconds ***
*** The Helicopter Will Depart in 20 seconds ***
*** The Helicopter Will Depart in 10 seconds ***
*** The Helicopter Will Depart in 5 seconds ***
*** The Helicopter is Departing ***
*** Rocket in 10 seconds ***
*** Rocket in 5 seconds ***
*** Rocket Launched ***
*** ZOMBIES ON THE HELICOPTER, SHOOT THEM OUT!! ***
zh_trans: *** 僵尸上飞机了!! 把他们射下去 ***

original: *** YOU ARE PLAYING ON MEDIUM DIFFICULTY!! KIDS!! ***
zh_trans: *** 你们正在玩中等难度!! 孩子们!! ***

original: *** Shoot the Bridge Down!! ***
*** THE ICE GUN HOLDER HAS 60 SECONDS TO LEAVE THE VENTS BEFORE THE ANTI CAMPER ACTIVATES! ***
zh_trans: *** 在反管道狗系统激活前，冰冻枪持有者有 60 秒的时间离开管道! ***

original: *** THE ICE GUN HOLDER HAS 10 MORE SECONDS TO LEAVE THE VENTS BEFORE THE ANTI CAMPER ACTIVATES! ***
zh_trans: *** 在反管道狗系统激活前，冰冻枪持有者还有 10 秒的时间离开管道! ***

original: *** THE BIG ROCK ON THE WOOD PLATFORM CAN BE BROKEN BY THE TANK ***
zh_trans: *** 坦克可以破坏大石头上的木质平台 ***

original: *** Boat Leaving in 5 Seconds ***
*** YOU ARE PLAYING ON HARD DIFFICULTY GUYS!! ***
zh_trans: *** 兄弟们，咱们现在正在玩困难难度了!! ***

original: *** YOU HAVE TO GO TO THE HOUSE THIS TIME!! ***
zh_trans: *** 这个点你必须得进房子了!! ***

original: *** Rescue ETA in less than 2 minutes ***
zh_trans: *** 救援预计时间会少于 120 秒 ***

original: *** JUMP ON THE CEILING TO HOLD ON IT! ***
zh_trans: *** 跳到天花板上! 抓稳! ***

original: *** THE BIG ROCK ON THE WOOD PLATFORM CAN BE BROKEN BY ZOMBIES ***
zh_trans: *** 僵尸可以破坏大石头上的木质平台 ***

original: *** THE LADDER WILL NOT BREAK ANYMORE! FALL BACK!! ***
zh_trans: *** 梯子现在不可破坏! 撤退!! ***

original: *** Press E to push things away with this gun! ***
zh_trans: *** 按 E 用推力枪推开僵尸! ***

original: *** YOU CANNOT BARRICADE THE TRAM! ***
*** YOU CANNOT BARRICADE THE TELEPORT! ***
*** DO NOT SPAM ATTACK KEY, WAIT UNTIL ATTACK ANIMATION ENDS ***
zh_trans: *** 不要狂按攻击键，等待攻击动画结束 ***

original: *** TANK IS DEAD!!! ***
*** YOU CANNOT BARRICADE THE TRAIN! ***
*** SHOOT THE LADDER TO HOLD THE ZOMBIES!!!! ***
